861510.name: Sail Ships
861510.description:
This is a casual, 3D game with sail ship battles.

There is a world map showing the position of some enemy ships, and the position of your own ship (with the points of the compass).

You can use a compass and a world map to determine the way you reach the (displayed) enemy ships.

The world map will only show you the position of your ship and your opponents, if it is prompted by pressing a key. You have a limited number of queries, which is reduced for each query, but you get new ones by defeating enemy ships. Worth to count this for good navigation.

17 enemy ship type in the game.

You can fight with other character in a tactical duel. The characters have three types of weapons (sword, shield, bow). You can win if you attack the enemy character with the right weapon.

You can create the design of your own ship from different parts.

Features:

  • Ship battles

  • Navigation with compass and world map

  • Tactical duel

  • 17 enemy ship type

  • Design maker
